transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Hi Sarah, this is Emma from Surf Rehab. How are you feeling after your session last week?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh hi Emma! I'm feeling so much better. The exercises you gave me have really helped with my shoulder mobility.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: That's wonderful to hear! Are you keeping up with the daily routine we discussed?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, every morning. I can actually lift my arm above my head now without pain. It's amazing!

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Excellent progress! Let's schedule your next appointment to continue building on this improvement.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to speak to someone about my treatment. I'm having some issues.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Of course Marcus, I'm here to help. What's been concerning you?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: The exercises you gave me are making my back pain worse. I'm really worried I'm doing more damage.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you describe exactly what you're feeling and when it happens?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: It's a sharp pain right here in my lower back, especially when I do those twisting movements. It wasn't this bad before.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Let's get you in to see Dr. Williams as soon as possible. I'm going to modify your exercise plan immediately and we'll reassess your treatment approach.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Good afternoon Jennifer, this is Surf Rehab calling about your upcoming appointment.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh yes, I was actually going to call you. I need to reschedule my Thursday appointment.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: No problem at all. What day would work better for you?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Could we do Friday afternoon instead? I have a work commitment I can't move.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Let me check our Friday availability... Yes, I have 2:30 PM or 4:00 PM available.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: 2:30 PM works perfectly. Thank you so much for being flexible.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Hi David, it's been two weeks since your last visit. How's your knee feeling?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Much better actually! I've been able to go for short walks without the limp.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: That's excellent progress! Are you still doing the strengthening exercises we discussed?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, religiously. Three times a day just like you said. My wife even helps me with the resistance band exercises.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Wonderful! Family support makes such a difference. How's your pain level on a scale of 1 to 10?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: It's down to about a 2 or 3 now. When I started it was definitely an 8.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: That's a fantastic improvement! Let's continue with your current program and I'll see you next week to assess if we can start adding more activities.

action_items: Assess for activity progression next visit

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Hi Lisa, we missed you at your appointment yesterday. Is everything okay?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh my goodness, I completely forgot! I'm so sorry. Work has been absolutely crazy.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: No worries at all, these things happen. How are you feeling though? Any changes with your neck pain?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Actually, it's been getting worse again. The stress at work isn't helping and I haven't been doing the exercises as much.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: I understand work stress can definitely impact recovery. Let's get you rescheduled as soon as possible and discuss some stress management techniques.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'm calling about my insurance coverage for physiotherapy sessions.

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Of course Robert, let me pull up your file. What specific questions do you have about your coverage?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: My insurance company said I have 12 sessions covered per year. How many have I used so far?

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Let me check... You've completed 6 sessions so far, so you have 6 remaining for this year.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Perfect. And if I need more than 12, what are the out-of-pocket costs?

transcript.speaker: staff
transcript.text: Our standard rate is $95 per session. However, we do offer a small discount for self-pay patients.

demo_talking_points: 🎯 Real-time sentiment analysis identifies patient concerns before they escalate
📊 Conversation insights reveal treatment effectiveness and patient satisfaction trends
🚨 Automated priority flagging ensures urgent issues get immediate attention
📝 AI-generated action items streamline follow-up care coordination
📈 Patient compliance tracking through conversation analysis
💡 Stress and lifestyle factors identified through natural conversation
🔄 Automated follow-up scheduling based on conversation outcomes
